title: (3620-339) Moimenta da Beira - 29 Rua Farol
description: Good place to rest. No service but super quiet. Possibility to spend the night without problem.

title: (3620) Viseu - 7 Rua Barreira de Vide
description: Parking at the church in Vila de rua only stopped for lunch but no restrictions lovely flat large car park and well lit

title: (3620) Vilar - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice

title: (3620) - Unnamed Road
description: Near the dam in the countryside with a magnificent view. Swimming in the lake welcome.

title: (3620) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful beach along the lake with a dam. No service but absolute tranquility.

title: (3620) - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic tables and a beautiful viewpoint near the Santuário de São Torcato. We stayed there on a Sunday at 2pm no one was there. Shade under the pines, maybe possibility to spend the night there, we did not try.

name: Parque de Campismo do Vilar - Barragem do Vilar
title: (3620) Parque de Campismo do Vilar - Barragem do Vilar
title_short: (3620) Parque de Campismo do Vilar - Barragem do Vilar
description:
Beautiful and quiet area,good surroundings and very clean.
Good people and very pleasent.
highly recommended

title: (3620) Leomil -
description: Close to the road with very little traffic, behind the pines. easy access by a path. very rustic but it helps.

title: (3640) - EM505
description: Beautiful spot at the lake, in the shade under the pines. Quiet and quiet. Light wind. Clean. Perfect for sleeping. Warning: the path goes down slightly, is not necessarily suitable for motorhomes.

title: (3640) Fonte Arcada -
description:
Initially, we went to look at the spot opposite on P4N but on the other side, it was impossible to get near the water with our camper van. So we walked around the lake and found a trail that led directly to the water's edge. A bit of a bumpy track but it's easy to navigate with our 6.50m camper van. Access by a track to the north east of the lake.
Several possible spots. Absolute tranquility, magnificent landscape, swimming possible.

title: (3620) Faia - 2 Travessa Barragem
description: Beautiful parking in Faia by the river. Easy access, there are some picnic tables and a barbecue area for public use. The swimming area is really nice, would recommend.

title: (3620) Faia - Caminho Sr. da Aflição
description: Super pleasant and really very quiet corner not far from the dam lake, provide drinking water and something to eat because the shops are far away, possibility of spending several nights.

title: (3640) Fonte Arcada - Miradouro da Senhora da Saúde
title_short: (3640) Fonte Arcada - Miradouro da Senhora da Saúde
description: Great spot at flat hill of “Miradouro de Nossa Senhora da Saúde”, with amazing views towards W across the Albufeira de Vilar (dam) and the hills beyond, as well as Fonte Arcada village just below; also nice sunset. Very quiet to overnight.

title: (3640-120) Freixinho - Unnamed Road
description: Leisure stone paved lane with trees along Vilar dam aside Freixinho village. Illuminated at night. Very peaceful besides near village. Take care with GPS access; follow “Zona de lazer” panel on main road/street.

title: (5110) - CM1104
description: Ideal place for lovers of calm with breathtaking views of the vineyards and apple fields. End of paved road so no passage. (wind turbines nearby) We went up with a motorhome of 7,40m but beware of some turns that may require some maneuvering

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte -
description: Newly created parking lot, little un leveled and gravel soil. Only for self-sufficient vehicles! Wonderful new 3 km long walking trail (“Passadiço do Távora”) on wood along the shore of Vilar dam. Modern pedestrian bridge! 2 small restaurants in the village and bridge to N 226 road. Don’t miss visit ver old small city SERNANCELHE, 4 km away.

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte - 307 Rua Direita
description: Flat riverside free P (on line parking not painted, followed by transversal marked spaces), just aside riverside with beach (beginning of Vilar dam). Bar, picnic tables and children's games nearby, as well as restaurant. Pleasant surroundings (extended panorama from hill of Senhora das Necessidades chapel, 2 km away accessible to vehicles beside hard climbing up); walking path “Passadiço do Távora”.

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte - 307 Rua Direita
description: Small parking lot where I often see campers.

title: (3640) Vila da Ponte - 12 Marginal Távora
description: Free in line P along Marginal do Távora lane just aside Távora river left side, parallel to N 226 that follows at higher level. Alternative to P nearer beach on beginning of dam. Hike “Passadiço do Távora” starts 600m away.

title: (3610) - Avenida António Teixeira
description: Pleasant parking for picnics. Tables and fountain. good views and shadow

title: (5110) Santa Cruz -
description: Picnic area in the chapel car park. 5 tables and stone bench to eat. Quiet in the middle of apple trees. Place for 7 CC easy!

title: (3640) Quintela - Lapa
description: Lapa, Sernancelhe - Large parking area close to the Santuário de Nossa Senhora da Lapa. A nice place to be visited.

title: (3640) - 2 Avenida Padre Francisco Pinto Ferreira (EM584)
description: Peacefully parking to spend the night. so peaceful

title: (3610) Salzedas - 1 Praça António Pereira de Sousa
title_short: (3610) Salzedas - 1 Praça António Pereira de Sousa
description: Small car park on the left at the entrance of the village in front of a children's play area. Nice view of the convent. Valley of vineyards and pleasant village. Go to the restaurant next to the Casa do Forno convent: good and plentiful and the owner very kind.

title: (3640-219) Sernancelhe - 18 Largo Município
description: Square with old town hall on the middle, and other parking spaces on streets around, just in middle of this very old small city (XII century) still with several original granite buildings and pilori. Police (GNR) office very near. Also near long stairs to climb top of castle ruin hill. Maybe busy on working hours. NOTE about vehicle dimensions: difficult to > 2,5m and 7m long.

title: (3640-211) Sernancelhe - 37 Avenida Tílias
description: Small public free P aside sport ground, very near main and long Tílias Avenue, and firemen (= Bombeiros). Not compatible for motorhomes longer than camper vans (for longer vehicles, see another P in this small town).

title: (3640) Sernancelhe - R. Colégio
description: Public free illuminated P, aside N 229 road and building “Exposalão - Pavilhão multiusos” as well as bus station. Supposed to be quiet to overnight because traffic remains reduced. Leveled places at bottom.

title: (3640) Sernancelhe - 18 Bairro do Sul Minheiro
description: Washing machine, service station, car wash and vacuum cleaner. Nearby there is a food shop, a bakery and a children's park.

title: (3640) Segões - M581-1
description: Parking lot of the nice river beach. after the main parkings on the road, there is a flat esplanade on dirt. swimming is also possible, cafe and toilets from the bar.

title: (3610) Tarouca - 77 Avenida Doutor Sá Carneiro
description: Parking de Parc de loisirs, accessible in périodes hors saison. Assez calme la nuit mais pas dans les heures ouvrables car il ya all près a entreprise de BTP avec des engins bruillants. Sinon une partie du parc est accessible et pourra vous faire faire une pause verte pour vos animaux.

name: Parque de merendas de N Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz.
title: (3640) Parque de merendas de N Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz.
title_short: (3640) Parque de merendas de N Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz.
description: Picnic space in the middle of nature on top of the hill, flat to overnight, crowned by chapel Nossa Senhora de Ao Pé da Cruz (875m). Good access besides slope; spaces under and out trees. Extended landscapes mainly towards NW (Sernancelhe small town and Vilar dam). Tranquility and peace. Advise about not remain longer than 12 h. Hike “Rota da Castanha e do Castanheiro”.

title: (5110) Armamar - N313
description: Revolution laundromat in good working order

title: (3640-180) Sarzeda - 32 Rua Cieiro
description: Sarzeda village of Sernancelhe county, district of Viseu: water fountain on roundpoint of N 229 road. It has not thread, so requires hose about 3 cm diameter.

title: (3610) Tarouca - 9 Rua Doutor Abel de Sousa Lira
title_short: (3610) Tarouca - 9 Rua Doutor Abel de Sousa Lira
description: Fresh water

address.street: 9 Rua Doutor Abel de Sousa Lira

title: (5120) Barcos - EM514
description: Parco de Merendas. Location in the countryside, very well equipped, service area visibly brand new. At the exit of the village of Barcos follow the signs. Possibility to spend the night .. tables and BBQ available. Very calm.  Bathrooms are down the hill, underneath the 2 stone ramps.

title: (3640) Sernancelhe -
description: Place on top of a hill, with good views. Very quiet, the wind turbine makes a continuous noise, inside the vehicle it is not heard. Road suitable for all vehicles.

title: (5120) Tabuaço - 8 Bairro da Sertã, R. Abel Botelho
title_short: (5120) Tabuaço - 8 Bairro da Sertã, R. Abel Botelho
description: Parking without services near the Municipal swimming pools. Quiet place. About 200 m from the pools. Possibility of services and shower during the pool hours.

address.street: 8 Bairro da Sertã, R. Abel Botelho

title: (3640-180) Sarzeda - M582
description: Sarzeda village of Sernancelhe county, district of Viseu. Water fountain without thread (requiring hose about 3cm diameter). 500m away from N229 road.

title: (5120-399) Tabuaço - 7 Rua Abel Barradas
description: For washing (duration 30 minutes). for drying (20 minutes). Professional machines and top quality. The lady is super nice, speaks Portuguese, English, German and French.

title: (3610) Tarouca - Unnamed Road
description: Capela Santa Helena da Cruz, Tarouca. Amazing view at the top of the mountain. Ideal for lunch or sleep. Very calm. No water for dishes and BBQ area but no toilet

title: (3630-018) Antas -
description: Superb spot to cool off, spend an afternoon or evening, even night in my opinion.

name: Quinta da Padrela
title: (5120-082) Quinta da Padrela
description:
Property of 12 hectares, located in the heart of the Douro Region, World Heritage by UNESCO. The location reserved for motorhomes (5000 m2) is surrounded by vineyards. Pool available when empty guest house. Free personalized guided tour to the property. Free tasting of wines, olive oil and other regional products. The visit is made by the owners who welcome visitors in a family atmosphere. Open all year.
From March to October reception until 7 p.m.
From November to February reception until 5:30 p.m.
Water point. Free Wifi. Toilet and bathroom available and free. Market / grocery store nearby. This winery is located 3 km from the villages of Tabuaço and Barcos. Free motorhome service area in the Village of Barcos (5 min by motorhome). Barbecue allowed.
Information:
Way Pinhão Village to Quinta da Padrela: follow N222, turn towards Tabuaço on N323. Always follow the N323 to Vila de Tabuaço, then take the M512 to Quinta da Padrela. Always stay on a asphalt road.

title: (3630) Antas -
description: We slept here one night, when you are on the main "main" road you have to take a small pebble path and the spot will be almost immediately on the left. Super quiet place. The view is superb

title: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - N329
description: Very shaded, stone benches and tables. Certainly possible for a night.

title: (5120) Tabuaço -
description: Small place of nature below a bridge. Possible to park under a tree in the shade and to turn around. Clean and flat place.

title: (5120) Tabuaço - Quinta do Monte Travesso
description:
total relaxation!
It is located in the heart of the port region, declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. La Quinta is located near the Douro River, 5 km (3 miles) from Tabuaço and the wine village of Barcos. It is a typical estate of the Douro region, surrounded by vineyards and olive trees in schist soil.
It’s the perfect place to connect with nature!
Free guided tour of the property, by appointment. Open all day (9:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m.). Wine tastings available at 4 p.m. by appointment. Wine shop. Water point. Market/grocery store nearby. Free bathroom with shower. Electricity available. Open all year.

title: (5120) - EM504 1
description: Path that goes down to the right before the bridge on 50 meters, half turn possible down, you will be next to the small water court, very pleasant place in hot weather sheltered from the wind, access 4x4 exclusively.

title: (5120) Dessejosa - EM504 1
description: Small dominant area for 2 motorhomes in a bend, in front of an old abandoned house overlooking a river and olive groves. It is the end of the world accessible to all type of gauge by a small road in excellent condition. The place is exceptionally quiet, with the only nuisance song of birds and water runoff below! No service of course but optimal satellite reception and 4G acceptable.

title: (3610) Tarouca - Unnamed Road
description: Viva Chritorei, great place, but nevertheless isolated and peaceful. Magnificent view of the valley. Closed toilets but barbecue fountain and picnic table.

title: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - 1 Largo Carvalhal
title_short: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - 1 Largo Carvalhal
description: Place in the center of a very nice small town, several cafe-restaurant really cheap. Tranquil the day as well as the night. Avoid Friday evening, every other week there is the market.

title: () - EM504
description: A 1.8km paved road, in very good condition, leads to a small chapel, Santa Cruz. Nevertheless the narrowness has earned us some cold sweats with our PL of 10m! But the result is worth it! It is better a lighter jig!

title: (3630) Penedono - N331
description: Free public P, asphalt but a little unleveled, near roundpoint and direct access from N 331 road (opposite side of municipal swimming pool), with memorial. At 908m high. Easy access (300m) to historic center of this medieval village with medieval small shaped nice castle; near it, tourist office and bar, restaurant and traditional shopping. Supermarket following street to right of P outlet.

title: (5100) Várzea de Abrunhais - Rua dos Moinhos
title_short: (5100) Várzea de Abrunhais - Rua dos Moinhos
description: Parking lot on gravel directly on the river

title: (5120) Porto - EM504 1
description: Place for 1 camper / van next to the cemetery, surrounded by vineyards. Flat land, quiet neighborhood, great views, few cars. Perfect for one night.

title: (5120) Tabuaço -
description: After the road, continue on the path. At the very end possibility of parking (only one place or two) at the edge of the water. Very peaceful to spend the night in the middle of nature.

title: (5120) - EM512
description: Picnic table and paved gazebo.

title: (5120) Barcos -
description: Nice spot on the water!

title: (3650) Vila Nova de Paiva - N323
description: Beautiful place for Pic nic with trees and tables near from river

name: Parque de campismo "Quinta Chave Grande"
title: (3560) Parque de campismo "Quinta Chave Grande"
description: Authentic campsite in a green setting. very warm welcome. all amenities available. here we speak french.super meetings with the rare villagers met. change of scenery and serenity guaranteed. the detour is worth it. take the time to stay there.

title: (3570) Aguiar da Beira - 11 Avenida da Liberdade
title_short: (3570) Aguiar da Beira - 11 Avenida da Liberdade
description: Public free P behind Câmara Municipal (= townhall), maybe busy on working hours, a little un leveled at bottom (no painted spaces), illuminated by night, quiet enough to overnight. Near traditional shops. Monuments and tourist office accessible easily by foot.

title: (3570-043) Aguiar da Beira - 2 Rua Costeira
description: Small free P on old castle ruins hill (802m) near historic center and tourist office, little un leveled. Nice sunset from the P, and sunrise just opposite castle ruins slope. Street round this hill, with extended panorama day and night to E and S. Quiet overnight (illuminated); if windy, move to the other P suggestion.

title: (5120) - N323
description: Quiet place to spend the night away from pinhao. suitable for a van or a car but no camper. the location is quite narrow. we can fish there. little passage on this road. Even quieter if you continue the road that ends with a path along the river, 200m further

title: (5110-354) Fontelo -
description: Small car park for 1 maxi motorhome / 2 or 3 vans, on the banks of the Douro. Visiting local fishermen. Ideal for a shady night with the lapping of the river.

title: (5110) Fontelo - 5110 CM1102
description:
Sao Dominos viewpoint parking.
Superb view of the Douro Valley.
"Uncontrolled" water point.

title: (5120) Adorigo - N222
description: On a disused petrol station adjacent to the Casa dos Peixinhos restaurant, along a moderately busy road and facing the Douro, free parking, paved and level. The place is particularly pleasant with a privileged view of the vineyards. The owner of the restaurant owner of the area and his staff are exceptionally sympathetic. They understand and speak a little French. No service but WC available and if necessary possibility of having drinking water by asking the boss. Optimum satellite and 4G reception. Sale of Porto from the vineyard of the boss.

title: (5120) - N222
description: Parking in the Foz do távora shop, by the roadside. We spent a quiet night there, apart from the noise from the cars. No amenities but no problem. On December 29 it must be specified.

title: (5100-196) Lamego -
description: Gas bottle refill - E. Leclerc petrol station. They have a few old adapters but only Portuguese style. Speaking English, very nice, no issue with filling the bottle. Happy days!

title: (3650) Coelheira - Unnamed Road
description: Very beautiful site in the middle of nature ideal for a night of stage. Much nicer than the car parks nearby, we came across this site by chance. We regret that we did not find it too late because we would gladly have spent the night. A fountain of spring water on site. Beware of fire, be particularly careful! a little further, the forest already burned. Respect this place as much on the cleanliness as on the risk of fire.

title: (5100-196) Lamego - 1 N226
description: Service area in the Leclerc supermarket car park during store opening hours. A launderette on the floor below and store. DIY. Parking only during store opening hours. No possibility of sleeping at night

title: (3650) - Variante à N329
description: Abandoned gas station, but parking for lunch break, because no rest area for more than 100 kms. No service

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Lots of places to land. Some tracks are abandoned and require a real franchisor.

title: (5110) Folgosa - N222
description:
Small parking bay beside the road. Great for picknick. For vans and small camper. 
Due to the road some traffic noise.

title: (5085) Sabrosa - CM1268
description: At the edge of the Dourau in front of the station, two trains pass there every evening. Place facing the vineyards with evening sun

title: (5100-196) Lamego - 3 Avenida Dom Egas Moniz
description: When he arrived they were at fairs and the large parking lot had installed the attractions, I saw him passing by, I did not sleep, but I did not see restrictions

title: (3570) Coja - N229
description: Macadam path leaving the national road to rush into the forest on the edge. Several pitches, very little sloping but above all very quiet, not or little traffic.

title: (3630) - Unnamed Road
description: Antas by the lake. Several places all around with an area with all the equipment. Barbecue, tables, water and a remarkable calm.

title: (3650-020) Fráguas - 30 Rua Ponte Velha
description: Nice place right next to the river beach, beautiful view of the village, very quiet at night with toilet bins and drinking water tap. We stayed there for 3 days and 3 nights without any problems.

title: (5100-073) Lamego - 12 Avenida Visconde Guedes Teixeira
description: Little street just on the left side of Café Maia, on the main square

title: (5100-081) Lamego - 53 Avenida Doutor Alfredo Sousa
description: Laundry open 365 days a year from 7am-10pm. Wash detergent softener. There’s also a person on site doing ironing services.

title: (5100) Lamego - Av. Dom Jacinto Botelho
description: Large parking lot directly at the stairs to the pilgrimage church. You could also stay overnight.

title: (5100) Lamego - 13 Rua Doutor Justino Pinto Oliveira
title_short: (5100) Lamego - 13 Rua Doutor Justino Pinto Oliveira
description:
Em frente ao Multiusos de Lamego

In front of the Multiusos de Lamego

title: (5100) Lamego - 1 N2
description: Good location with lots of shadows, swimming pool nearby, shops, Repsol petrol stations. Next to the stairs of Nossa Senhora dos Remédios

title: (5100-108) Lamego - 9 Rua de Almacave
description: Right in the center of the city next to the municipal market. Harder in the morning because that's why you support the market. Saturday afternoon and sleeping all day is quiet. Nearby restaurants and cafes.

title: () Lamego - CM1081
description: Nice parking, overnight possible, no service

title: (5100) - N222
description: Parking area in the lock of Bagauste, very colorful the ski lift of the tourist boats in the lock with a difference of 27 meters.

title: (5100-081) Lamego - Monte de Santo Estevão
description: Parking on the back of the Sanctuaries ... We are in Van Combi but I think it's possible in a Camper. Ideal for spending a night there, no passage of car during the night. In the morning great to enjoy the place. it was calm. The bells did not ring at night, only after 7 or 8 in the morning.

title: (5100) Lamego - 1 Rua Dom Marcos de Mendonça
title_short: (5100) Lamego - 1 Rua Dom Marcos de Mendonça
description: Parking, no facilities.

title: (5100) Lamego - 1 N2
description: Free parking space materialized in a climb, allowing access not too far from the stairs.

name: Camping Lamego
title: (5101-909) Camping Lamego
description: Very pleasant Lamego campsite on the heights of Lamego, in a wine-growing estate, friendly welcome until 10 p.m. Sale of port and others. Watch out for large riders: - the cobblestone access road is extremely steep with a hairpin bend - the entrance gate is very narrow,

title: () Sátão - N323
description: Large free parking of the botanical park, no service, a paradise for electro-sensitive, no 3G signal, far from everything, very quiet.

title: (5050) Peso da Régua - N313-1
description: Great viewpoint over the Douro. Many picnic tables. Trees for shade. Public WC. No prohibitions, no fees. Very quiet. Excursion traffic on the weekend. Restaurant a few hundred meters away.

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Unnamed Road
description:
A nice spot located next to a vineyard under a pine tree with a beautiful view.
easy access and can probably fit 2 campervans.
*update: lots of flying bugs during the night

title: (5130) - Unnamed Road
description: The most beautiful place to park either during the day or overnight. Just off the N222 route in Portugal, this park up offers the most stunning vistas that Portugal has to offer. Rolling hills reaching out over 15km - the Douro river spread symetrically across the landscape, with small fishing vessels and the occasional cruise boat hum along across the scene. And to top it off a train line follows the river In the distance, before making its way into the small Portuguese villiage. Oh and this is Vine yard territory, so contouring galore! If you’re on the long drive to Porto via the N222 (voted Avis’ best driving road) stop and stay the night. Next levs lush!

title: (5100) Bigorne -
description: It has drinking water, a good place to rest

name: Praia Fluvial de Trabulo
title: (3560) Praia Fluvial de Trabulo
description: Beach on Vouga river, with bar and facilities (closed out Summer). Larger P 300m away. Sanctuary N. Sr. dos Caminhos lies 1 km East.

title: (3560) Decermilo - Santuário N. Sr. dos Caminhos
title_short: (3560) Decermilo - Santuário N. Sr. dos Caminhos
description: Sanctuary “Nosso Senhor dos Caminhos” with several picnic tables with shadows and several parking.  Hike “Rota dos Míscaros” (mushrooms).

title: (5100) Lamego - Unnamed Road
description: Place with beautiful views and very quiet. Away from the road and without noise or traffic. It is accessed by a slightly broken dirt track but without the need for a 4x4. The space is just right for a 4x4/camper, but further down there are spaces for the occasional car.

title: (5130) - N222
description: Viewpoint over the valley, along the road, with picnic table.

title: (5100) Lamego - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place with excellent views and surrounded by nature. I spent one night

title: (5085) Pinhão - EM590
description: Super place on the banks of the douro, we spent a rather quiet night despite the boats leaving their engines, nice restaurant next door.

title: (5085) Pinhão - EM590
description: Parking nice and official frame for campers, noisy

title: (5085) Pinhão - Unnamed Road
description: Small place ideal for eating next to the douro

title: (5085-042) Pinhão - 18 Rua António Manuel Saraiva
description: Toilets and showers. To sleep, prefer the spot in front of the restaurants

title: (5085) Pinhão - EM590
description: Faced with the Douro. Boat trips possible. Magnificent view. Very difficult to access for big jigs (steep and paved street, hairpin bend)

title: (3650) - Unnamed Road
description: Minas de querigas old tin mine with cave filled with water beautiful photos to do when the sun sends its ray in the bottom of the mine. Counted 2 km of track from the road

title: (5085-037) Pinhão - 23A Rua António Manuel Saraiva
description: Drinking fountain, in front of the station

title: () Peso da Régua - N2
description: Free section of the motorhome park. I thought I add it here separately as we always filter for free services and nearly missed this one as it is included under the paid one next door.

title: (5050) Peso da Régua - 134 Avenida da Galiza
title_short: (5050) Peso da Régua - 134 Avenida da Galiza
description: Nice car park facing the Douro with services, between the river and the shops. Paying places (with water and electricity on the square) and non-paying places (without service on the square). Complete service area next door. Go to the bar above the swimming pool for the rules and to open the blocked places.

title: (5100-426) Lamego -
description: For one night, view of the requa bridges, quiet. Strobe light nearby in the early evening, not bothersome with curtains. Douro Museum 20min walk.

title: (5085) Pinhão - 6 Rua Ponte do Pinhão
description: Parking along the long arm of the douro. Buses and trucks.

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira -
description: Small pine forest behind a chapel. Portuguese layout: tables, benches, BBQ, garbage cans. Very calm place. Arrival at La Chapelle, take the tour to get there.

title: (5100) - N226
description: A small shaded terrace with a superb view of the Douro, the route is little used at night and you sleep perfectly well.

title: (5100) - Unnamed Road
description: Flat area, some pebbles but magnificent 360 degree view. Wind turbines nearby, so pretty windy area

title: (5085) Alijó - 9 N589
description: Arrived here by chance, the view is magnificent, the car park on the side of the road (little frequented because quite isolated) is paved and quite wide. Not very flat. We slept very well

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - 169 Avenida Dessarges
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - 169 Avenida Dessarges
description: Service point ONLY for wastewater (grey water), once blackwater (toilet) is locked and freshwater not available. Just aside N 222 road. Supermarket aside.

title: (5100) Lamego - Unnamed Road
description: Place with breathtaking views of the Douro and the valley. Not had the opportunity to spend the night there (just a picnic) but very quiet and relaxing place. No service, antennas and wind turbines nearby.

title: (5060) - Rua da Igreja
description: Espolas Santo Domingues de Gusamo Viewpoint with chapel. Unpaved, very steep path. No prohibition signs. Absolutely quiet. 4x4 recommended.

name: Avelal, santuário Senhor da Agonia
title: (3560) Avelal, santuário Senhor da Agonia
description: Free leveled parking in small sanctuary “Senhor da Agonia” on top of soft hill (round panorama from white&black top pin). Places with shadows and without. Several picnic tables and grill points. 1 km away from Avelal small village. Hike “Rota do Barrocal” (see photo).

title: (6420) Mendo gordo - Unnamed Road
description: Small artificial lake, with a road that ended in deadlock at the dam. Of multiple places along the Lake. The roads are more or less available (but there is for all the templates) off season, apart from a few fishermen, there is nobody. Overnight, no one at all (and we yet Saturday)

title: () - M 583 road
description: Nice natural platform at 630m high just on banks of Távora river, that here has small dam and a small old stone bridge. In Winter and Spring, on the grass. Very calm night accompanied by the singing of frogs. No services.

title: (5085-010) Casal de Loivos - R. da Fonte Santa
title_short: (5085-010) Casal de Loivos - R. da Fonte Santa
description: Small car park with a very nice view of the Pinhao valley. The location is quiet.

title: (6430) Casteição - Unnamed Road
description: Teja dam. No motor boat possible. Village above with access to water and small shops

title: (6420) Terrenho -
description: Very nice place, beautiful, calm, soothing, very nice spot to spend the night.

title: (6420) - Unnamed Road
description: Great spot on the Teja dam with its beach and barbecue! Very pleasant swimming ...

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Devesas
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Devesas
description: Free in-line P in quiet garden place with picnic tables, playground and big trees shade, ideal for eating and visit historic center of this village (do not miss tiles panels inside townhall (= Câmara Municipal) and wine museum (= Museu do Vinho) in new very interesting wooden building. This small town is biggest county producing Douro wine.

title: (5085) S. Cristovao - Miradouro Escritor Miguel Torga
title_short: (5085) S. Cristovao - Miradouro Escritor Miguel Torga
description: On the road between Pinhao and Sabrosa, many belvedere with enough clearance to park (more or less flat depending on the location). We were not disturbed at night and were able to enjoy the sunrise over the vines and the Douro. Gorgeous!

title: (5130-340) São João da Pesqueira - Rua do Pombal
title_short: (5130-340) São João da Pesqueira - Rua do Pombal
description: Free flat P in front of secundary school, with extended panorama over small village and mountains around Douro valley. Beautiful sun rising. Busy during lessons timetable but free evenings and nights and whole weekend. Read on Largo da Devesa about what to visit.

title: (6420) Terrenho - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the lake, several possibilities of parking until the dam or the road stops. The access is excellent and practicable by all the templates. Here is the calm, softness and serenity guaranteed at the edge of the water and 500 meters from the small village of Terrenho. No service, but optimal satellite and 4G reception.

name: Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo
title: (5130-321) Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo
title_short: (5130-321) Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo
description: Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo This camping area is connected to the local public sports center. Besides very nice pitches for tents, it has six flat stone pitches for campers with electricity and water. Toilets and showers are shared with the sports center. During the season the large public swimming pool is complementary. Very friendly staff. During the off-season, it was very quiet. A few steps from the historic center and the tile panels inside the town hall (= Câmara Municipal) and the wine museum (= Museu do Vinho) in a modern and interesting wooden building (this county is the largest producer of Douro wine).

name: Quinta do Roncão | Vinhos & Azeite Douro | Visitas & Provas
title: (5050-341) Quinta do Roncão | Vinhos & Azeite Douro | Visitas & Provas
title_short: (5050-341) Quinta do Roncão | Vinhos & Azeite Douro | Visitas & Provas
description:
Located about 5 min drive from São Leonardo de Galafura viewpoint, this property of 23 hectares provides 3 parking spots for motorhomes with a beautiful view to vineyards and forest. The visitor is welcome to stay overnight after a purchase.
Private guided tours to the property with tasting of wines and olive oil are available under reservation and for a fee. The visit is made by the owners who welcome visitors in a family atmosphere.  
Please contact (available on WhatsApp) for any enquiries.
If you are travelling in a big motor home coming from south(Peso da Regua), we advise to avoid the M593, but use the N313-2 instead.

title: (3600) - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area, play area for children, easy parking, shade, night possible, no service.

title: (5050-071) Godim - 6 Avenida Sacadura Cabral
description: Automatic outside laundry with free access a dryer, two washing machines. On the parking lot of intermaché by very practical for the big motorhome.

title: (5050-071) Godim - 6 Avenida Sacadura Cabral
description: There is another laundrette in the street next to that of intermarche, brand new with the advantage of being seated. 1 machine and 2 tumble dryer from .

title: (5000-111) Guiães -
description: Corner in the middle of the pines on flat ground with a view of the village, ideal for one night

title: (5130) Pereiros -
description: Natural area just before the Nossa sanctuary. Splendid view, access to vans.

title: (5060-263) Provesende - 5 Viela das Pereiras
description: Small parking lot overlooking a beautiful valley. Toilets open. Amazing bar/museum next door, little cafe, little shop. We stayed for a quick stop but sure it would be OK to stay if you support the village amenities.

title: (5155) Custóias - Unnamed Road
description: Chapel at the top of the mountain, extraordinary view. Place arranged for the local festivals but deserted the evening of our coming.

title: (3600) Castro Daire -
description:
Idyllic place by the river for swimming and barbecuing. Free of charge. Toilets available but were closed (May 2023). No waste containers installed at the moment. Quiet night, but well attended when the weather is bathing.
Enjoy nature!

title: (5040) Fontelas - N108
description: Caldas de Moledo Thermal Resort. There is parking at the entrance to the park which is free, pleasant and safe. Enough shade at Rio Douro 200 meters away.

title: (5060) Guiães - EM587
description: Easy parkinglot at a quiet road, between the trees, a little away from a beautiful view. Place for 3 or 4. we did't sleep here, but I expect it to be quiet.

title: (4660) São Martinho de Mouros - 516 Rua do Monte do Calvário
title_short: (4660) São Martinho de Mouros - 516 Rua do Monte do Calvário
description: In the middle of the mountains in the Douro valley In the parking lot of a religious building overlooking the valley possibility of staying for a meal break. Thank you for leaving the place spotless, it is a religious place

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Covinhas
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Covinhas
description: Large car park at Mirador de Sao salvador do Mundo. We stayed the night. Little traffic. A beautiful view at the top of the watchtower.

name: Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
title: () Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
title_short: () Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
description: Quinta dos espinheiros. AMAZING! If you want to taste some authentic port, wine and delicious olive oil this is the place! Experience the real Portuguese hospitality, find a spot for the night on this cute property with amazing views! We stayed for free with free electricity and tons of smiles! Anna speaks a great english, french and espagnole! She knows all about the region and her wines. We stumbled upon this place (with a caravane sign) and sooo glad we went for it! Truly recommend it! don’t hesitate to help this local business and buy their product they are delicious!

name: Viewpoint of Sao Salvador do Mundo
title: () Viewpoint of Sao Salvador do Mundo
title_short: () Viewpoint of Sao Salvador do Mundo
description: Nice quiet place with a really beautiful view of the river about 600 meters below. The view is great.

title: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (3600-083) Castro Daire - 65 Rua Capitão Salgueiro Maia
description: Easy parking above a sports field, with beautiful views and no lighting. Located in a quiet residential area, uncrowded at night, little traffic in the morning, some dogs barking at night. Not the most charming place, but good enough for one night.

title: (5060) Provesende - N323
description:
Nice picnic area on the Pinhao road after the bridge, towards Sabrosa. a shadow
 welcome, picnic tables and a refreshing breeze. we only picnicked there, but nothing prevents us from spending a discreet night there.

title: (5130) Vale de Figueira - N222-3
description: Space at the edge of an arm of the Douro. Possibility of spending the night with a van. Provide calles to be horizontal and do not interfere with the passage. Several large picnic shale tables available. Some water activities not annoying and fishing.

title: (5155) Horta - N222
description: Free parking located in the center of the village. Accessible to all sizes, stabilized, level and close to some shops (Restaurant, bar), the place does not shine by its bucolic characteristics. No service but satellite reception and 4G optimal. Picnic tables available.

title: (3600-102) Castro Daire - 24 Rua da Portela
description:
Picnic area with a bombastic view, drinking water and the possibility to stand overnight.
Located on a 10km circular hiking trail. (information board at the church in the village)

Access rather nothing for huge ships.

title: (4660-034) Fundo de Vila - 15 Rua da Boa Vista
title_short: (4660-034) Fundo de Vila - 15 Rua da Boa Vista
description: Water point on the church square. Uncontrolled water

title: (3560) Sátão - 111 Rua Conde Dom Henrique
description: Municipal market free P, illuminated without trees. EXCEPT Sunday 00:00…15:00, when outside fare happens. To spend the night. Near the small town center with bars, restaurants and shopping. A bit noisy week as school is next. Possible also to sleep in the Intermarché parking or large free P front of firemen (Bombeiros) and police (GNR).

name: Largo São Bernardo
title: (3560) Largo São Bernardo
description: Large free P very near small town center, surrounded by firemen (= Bombeiros), police (GNR) and church. Slightly sloping, illuminated, without trees. Traditional shopping nearby.

title: (3600-136) Castro Daire - 89 Avenida António Serrado
description: Just off an n2 roundabout, 10 minutes walk into the town. Car park shaded by trees. There are picnic benches to sit at.  Day parking only.  we have a 7m motor home, and as car park, was pretty empty could manoeuvre without a problem.  if car park is busy, then probably more suited to a smaller camper van.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 6 Rua Cabine
description: Parking

title: (5070) Cotas - 11 Rua da Gingeira
description:
Leaving the road, to a small trail (easy access) on your right, a water tower surrounded by pine trees. location, quiet, very quiet, well-shaded, no passage.

"respect this place"

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 16 Rua Raposeira
description:
For filling clean water only.
Public place.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 7 Largo Igreja
description: Public toilets, church and cleaning water on a fountain to drink. Trilho da Lombeira passes here

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
title_short: (3600) Castro Daire - 2 Rua Estrada da Barragem
description: Park day/night near the church

title: (5060) Celeirós - N323
description: Parking in front of quinta do Portal

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 1879 N228
description: Drinking water fountain well suited for filling water canisters. Large parking space.

title: () Santa Marta de Penaguião - 5030 EM601 1
description:
Motorhome service and parking area.
Completely new with everything you need to perform maintenance on your motorhome.
Free parking. Great views.
Very quiet place.

title: (4660) bernardo - 914 EM537
description: Picnic area on the banks of the Douro with: toilets (whitewater), barbecues in free access, drinking water and even a small private beach! Access "Cais de Bernado"

title: (5040) Vila Marim - N108
description: Parking at the water's edge with a nice view. Surely quiet on weekdays but beware on Saturday night till 04.00 music in  the bar nearby. Toilets and showers available in self service.

title: (3600) Castro Daire - N228
description: Small dirt parking off the road. Surrounded by Eucalyptus trees. We just stopped to got for a walk, but for one night, it could be a nice, quiet spot.

name: Camping Mêda Park
title: (6430) Camping Mêda Park
description: One of the most beautiful campsites in Portugal. Municipal campsite of Meda, Located right next to the municipal swimming pool and not the least !! first evening without swimming but tomorrow 10 am ohohoh!!!

address.street: Avenida Professor Adriano Vasco Rodrigues Portugal

title: (5130) Quinta Do Grichão Viseu -
description: Small BBQ area with space for up to 4 Van's. water for dishwashing. good nice views, had a good night.

title: (5130) Soutelo do Douro -
description: Très bon spot au bord du Douro, nous avons passé une nuit tranquille. Il y a de la place pour plusieurs véhicules. pas de commodités à part 3 tables et barbecue en dur. Route d'accès en lacets et étroite.

title: (5130) Miradouro De Vargelas - EM541
description: Beautiful paragraph to take advantage of the beautiful landscapes of the Douro and its Quintas. Very calm and with tables for PickNick.

title: () - EM552
description: Picnic area on the banks of the Douro, free parking, catering possible at the bar-restaurant in the village of Porto de Rei. Water point, swimming in the river possible or swimming pool.

title: () São Mamede de Ribatua - N212
description: On the banks of the Douro, fairly steep access, for vans only.

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira -
description: Magnificent little grassy beach, shaded with a friendly bar. very narrow access for van or small motorhome

title: (5140) Tua - N212
description: A nice little corner on the banks of the Douro. Barbecue, garbage cans, games for children. The path is dirt and a little steep. Watch out if it rained. Possibility to spend the night in the parking lot of the station just above.

title: (5030) Santa Marta de Penaguião - 41 Alameda 13 de Janeiro
title_short: (5030) Santa Marta de Penaguião - 41 Alameda 13 de Janeiro
description: Parking without service, very nice and quiet. Suitable for any motorhome. We had a quiet night. Shops and restaurants nearby.

title: (5155) - Rua das Flores
description: Ground parking allowing access to the ruin of the castle which is very nice to visit (in addition free access). The panorama is superb and could have spent the night there without problem. We also recommend the small town bar with a great welcome. Attention, difficult access road for large vehicle because the alleys of the city are narrow.

title: (5140) Castanheiro - Avenida da Estação
description: Large gravel place in Tua at the level crossing. We only parked, but there are no signs prohibiting overnight stays. Starting point for train journeys through the beautiful Douro Valley.

title: (4660-344) S. João da Fontoura - M5
description: Parking with possibility to fill water. Not sure for 100% that it’s drinking water, but looks good, with good pressure and connection. There are narrow roads to access this point, can be difficult for wider camps. (Our is 2,4m)

title: (5040) Gafaria - N108
description: View point parking with a small buffet

title: (5040) Vila Jusã - 614 N108
description: Magnificent source of drinking and fresh water with parking space. Although it does not have a sign, the neighbors have told us that it is drinkable.

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - N101
description: We stopped by chance on this parking near the cemetery, calm assured! Go to the bottom of the car park, breathtaking views of the Douro Valley. The village is above.

title: (3600) Mamouros - CM1154
description: Small parking next to the pleasant pool, sloping

title: (3600) Castro Daire - 196 Rua Balneário Termal
description: Near to N2 rout, public swimming pool from July to September, spa in “Termas do Carvalhal”. Mini market.

title: (3600) Pepim - N288
description: Old road overlooking a football field. a bit off the current road. In the middle of nature but without any particular charm. Helps out well for one night.

title: (5040) Matos - Bairro Doutor Sá Carneiro
description: Miradouro of São Silvestre Cimo do Douro. At the end of a very narrow and very steep road (only for small vehicles). Extraordinary panorama and calm. If you are not the first, be the second ... after that would be too crowded :-) No services, provide water ...

title: (3515) Calde - Unnamed Road
description: Nature corner near a dam, a few swimmers during the day, quiet at night. Access by a paved road.

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - 305 Caminho Jardim
description: Small parking lot, we just landed kk instant but possible to sleep I think, pleasant.

title: (6420-140) Trancoso - 6 Rua Madre Francisca da Conceição
title_short: (6420-140) Trancoso - 6 Rua Madre Francisca da Conceição
description: Only Parking, behind the Saint Luzia Church.

name: Camping NaturWaterPark
title: (5000-037) Camping NaturWaterPark
description:
NaturWaterPark water park campsite.
If you enter the campsite in the evening/night, you must leave before 5:00 p.m. the next day, losing 1 hour of fun. It is recommended to enter first thing in the morning.
The emptying and filling of water are outside the campsite, in the parking lot below.

title: () Trancoso - N226
description: Large car park near the fortifications of Trancoso. Friday market, parking may be inappropriate on Thursday night.

title: (5060) - 10 Rua Miguel Torga
description: Free park with lots of space

title: (3570) Pena Verde -
description: Beautiful view, tarmac road, super quiet place.

title: (6420-240) Trancoso - Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro
title_short: (6420-240) Trancoso - Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro
description: Laundry to wash and dry clothes but also wash your vehicle

address.street: Zona Industrial de R. 5 de Outubro

title: (5070) São Mamede de Ribatua - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5070) São Mamede de Ribatua - Unnamed Road
description: Great place to stay day and night, kids can play with the clean water.

title: (5040) Sedielos -
description: Good area in the middle of the Douro next to the Marão mountain range with beautiful ladscapes. Be sure to visit the Pituda leisure Park with beautiful river beach.

name: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
title: (4640) Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
description: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras" A campsite offering only one place for a small van, rather difficult to access but in the middle of the vineyards: reservation highly recommended. Great location with hammock available. Showers and toilets very clean. No services for camper. Very welcome with proposal for a ride in the middle of a river to reach a small waterfall. Bread order possible.

title: (4660-206) Resende - 35 Bairro Lapa e Nápoles
description: I was looking for a place far from civilization, and it's great, I'll have dinner on the street and stay until tomorrow.

title: (6430) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking full nature overlooking the castle. Quiet to spend the night.

title: (6430) Mêda - Unnamed Road
description: Small parking in front of the café Marqués (closed 27.02.17) sloping and paved at the foot of Castelo. Shared with cars this parking is not suitable for large size with a significant impatement given the inclination. No service. Optimum satellite and 4G reception. I could not stay with my DC 8 meters.

title: (6430) - Unnamed Road
description: Esplanade located a few meters back from the cruise (because this region is very exposed to the wind), you can see the castle and the city. Two kilometers from the center. Very calm district. The bells of sheep flocks when you walk. The visit to Marialva is essential. A charming village. A very kind older gentleman set up a chiringuito with a very cool terrace to rest and have a snack. The alleys are authentically medieval and flowery. The castle is in ruins but it is very large and contains the layout of old streets and houses. It is impressive to walk (carefully) on the wall bypassing it. We wish you as much pleasure as we do.

title: (4640) Baião - Unnamed Road
description: Heavenly place with a beach by the river. Three picnic tables, but no shade. Ideal for a swimming day.

title: (4660) Resende -
description: A small road that runs along the Douro on the left bank. A few narrow places. For a van, it's ok but the U-turn remains complicated. Nearby there is a pier for boats, and there is more room. The place is beautiful.
